title: Viral Video Alert: Anand Mahindra drives 'Bujji' from 'Kalki 2898 AD'
description: Anand Mahindra, Chairman of the Mahindra Group, recently took the futuristic vehicle 'Bujji' for a spin. This cutting-edge three-wheeled electric vehicle stars in the upcoming sci-fi epic "Kalki 2898 AD," directed by Nag Ashwin. Anand Mahindra's test drive has set social media abuzz, highlighting the fusion of technology and entertainment in this highly anticipated film.
